0.2.0.content: Trade page with real-time stock prices using the AlphaVantage API
List of tradable stocks (more coming soon)
Changelog page and link from homepage
Link to full changelog on github
Replaced placeholder titles with the new Innovocks name and font
Links to the user page when making account or logging in no longer returns 404 error
Selection of password requirements now follows the color scheme
A bit update with both this new changelog page and the trading page where users will be able to buy/sell stocks using real-time data. There were also some small QoL changes

0.1.0.content: Homepage with links to registration/login pages and contact section
Contact Us section (functionality is still work in progress)
Sections for feature points on homepage
Registration and login pages with implemented logic
Initial publishing of the website. Very bare bones, a lot of work in progress with only homepage and registration/login features.
